articles.title: Western Europe Can Expect More Heavy Rainfall And Fatal Floods As The Climate Warms - NPR
articles.description: The World Weather Attribution initiative has issued a report that said July's historic flooding in Europe is more likely to happen today due to global warming.
articles.content:
Destroyed houses are seen in Schuld, Germany, on July 15 after devastating floods hit the region.
